name: China Shop
description:
What happens when a kid enters a Chinese Store with the intention of stealing fortune cookies? Well, that happens! 

Navigate the store to pick up the cookie and go back out the door where you entered while avoiding contact with the people working there.

Simple and stereotypical store layout simply changing the location of the cookie and the moving routes of the employees has the player progress the levels. 

It was done just for fun, with little to no experience with the Gamemaker engine. Comical and wrong representations should not be taken seriously.
